TopicTitle: KSP.X86-64 for Ubuntu crashes after loading Asset Bundle Defenitions. Help Plz!

Articles.Content:
Hello guys, I'm a new user to the fourm.

I've been playing KSP for quite awhile on Windows, and it works great, but when I try to run on Ubuntu with limited Mods, the game crashes half-way through loading. I will post my KSP.log below.

[snip] 
 

Edited June 14, 2017 by Vanamonde

Welcome to our forum.

But please, for the sake of our page loading times, put your file on a sharing site and link to it here. A post as big as that one was causes problems.
A mod list and KSP version would be useful. Also, are you using KSP 32 bit or KSP 64 bit?
